effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's [Attack]{mechanic:attack} by three [stages]{mechanic:stage}.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises [Attack]{mechanic:attack} by three [stages]{mechanic:stage} in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
攻撃を　かなり　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It drastically raises the Attack stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta moltissimo l’Attacco di un Pokémon
in una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il Pokémon
è sostituito.

Hebt den Angriffs-Wert eines Pokémon im Kampf
stark an. Die Wirkung endet mit dem Austausch
des Pokémon.

Augmente sensiblement l’Attaque pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon
se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 공격을
상당히 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
こうげきを　かなり　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It drastically raises the Attack stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

It drastically raises the Attack stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte sensiblement l’Attaque pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe
si le Pokémon se retire.
